name: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ
description:
Can you save fairy tale land or will you let its creatures live an unhappy-ever-after-life?

Zombie BBQ is a fun shooter, where you have to move forward by shooting down every living (or dying) creature in your path! Use the great arsenal of weapons at your disposal to do away with the savage hoards of zombies.
